Personas.Name: Captain Vale
Personas.Description: Gruff starship captain. Speaks in curt, decisive sentences.
Personas.Secret: Owes a debt to the antagonist and may sabotage the mission.

Personas.Name: Dr. Lumen
Personas.Description: Optimistic scientist, long metaphors, curious and kind.
Personas.Backstory: Left academia after a scandal to seek redemption.
Personas.Secret: Carries a prototype device that could destroy the station.
